parameters.query:
SELECT 
  c.id as customer_id,
  c.name,
  c.email,
  c.phone,
  COUNT(DISTINCT l.id) as total_loans,
  SUM(l.original_amount) as total_borrowed,
  SUM(p.amount) as total_paid,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(p.payment_date, l.due_date)) as avg_days_late,
  DAY(MAX(p.payment_date)) as favorite_payment_day,
  DAYNAME(MAX(p.payment_date)) as favorite_weekday,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN p.type = 'partial' THEN 1 END) as partial_payments,
  (SELECT balance FROM current_loans WHERE customer_id = c.id LIMIT 1) as current_balance,
  (SELECT days_overdue FROM current_loans WHERE customer_id = c.id LIMIT 1) as days_past_due
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN loans l ON c.id = l.customer_id
LEFT JOIN payments p ON l.id = p.loan_id
WHERE c.id = '{{$json["customer_id"]}}'
GROUP BY c.id

values.content: Generate 3 personalized collection messages for customer {{$json["name"]}} with balance ${{$json["current_balance"]}} that is {{$json["days_past_due"]}} days overdue.
